description:
The Smartwool Active Fleece Colourblock Tight is a pair of leggings that are made of recycled polyester and merino wool. They are designed to keep you warm, comfortable, and protected from the elements when you are active outdoors.

  • They have a stretchy knit fabric that is soft and durable, and a colorblock design that is stylish and fun
  • They have an adjustable waist drawcord, a drop-in pocket, a zippered pocket, and reflective elements for convenience and safety
name: Smartwool Active Fleece Colourblock Tight - Women's
